result.arabic_text: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ
result.translation: 44.Yallih dudda tascasse astootik tanim, Yalli bar kee laqot aba korankorsiyya ken nammayak tiiy tiil keenik ciggiilisak, diggah tohut bagi inti-le marah kas edde geyaanam tan.
